title: Delivery
context: [ยง514B-88] Delivery. In this part, delivery shall be made by: (1) Personal delivery; (2) Registered or certified mail with adequate postage, to the recipient&rsquo;s address; provided that delivery shall be considered made three days after deposit in the mail or on any earlier date upon which the return receipt is signed; (3) Facsimile transmission, if the recipient has provided a fax number to the sender; provided that delivery shall be considered made upon the sender&rsquo;s receipt of automatic confirmation of transmission; or (4) Any other way prescribed by the commission. [L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง4]
